SEARCH
Package utilities

Class Session

java.lang.Object
utilities.Session
public class Session extends Object
This class acts as a data store and contains all active entities within the runtime of the programme (i.e. the current session)

  • Constructor Details

    • Session

      public Session()
      Constructor for Session Initialised in PageViewer only. Loads all data from LoadData's child classes to set the context of the current session
